headline: KKR nears deal to buy OSTTRA for about $3 billion, Bloomberg News reports
summary: U.S.-based private equity firm KKR is nearing a deal to buy OSTTRA for about $3 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter. The deal could be announced as early as next week, the report said. Bloomberg initially reported that private equity firm GTCR was close to acquiring OSTTRA, a joint venture owned by CME Group and S&P Global, for approximately $3.2 billion.
